actions.text: Mr. Doolittle rose to a question of the privileges of the House and submitted H. Res. 430 for consideration.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 417 - 1 (Roll no. 80).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Requiring an explanation from the chairman and vice chairman of the Ad Hoc Committee Investigating the Post Office of the Committee on House Administration of the allegations regarding disruption of the ongoing investigation.

summary.text: Directs the chairman and vice chairman of the Ad Hoc Committee Investigating the Post Office to appear before the House of Representatives to explain the reported attempt to interfere with the ongoing investigation. Affirms the need for an expedited investigation into the Office of the Postmaster. Condemns any attempt to interfere with the investigation.

titles.title: Requiring an explanation from the chairman and vice chairman of the Ad Hoc Committee Investigating the Post Office of the Committee on House Administration of the allegations regarding disruption of the ongoing investigation.
